page.title: 15 Travel in Wellow
page.content: The majority of people who live in Wellow work locally and travel there by foot.The other people work in Southampton or Romsey and travel by car. The local shops provide the essentials but the main shopping is done in Totton,Romsey, or Southampton and they travel there by car or bus.The majority of young children in Wellow go to school locally and go by foot.The older children go to school in Romsey. They travel there by bus or car.The nearest doctor's surgery,hospital,vet,and dentist are in Romsey,but a doctor visits the village twice a week.There is a local bus service from Wellow to Southampton,Romsey and Salisbury. By Lisa Berry and Amina Lyon.
